ComicInfo.Title: The Dark Lady
ComicInfo.Summary: While finishing up her degree in occult sciences in London, former actress Lori Lovecraft meets one of her idols, the famous actor Sir Andrew Parke-Jones. He invites her to his estate in Scotland to view his collection of esoteric lore, but when she arrives Sir Andrew has suffered a fatal heart attack. Eccentric Zelda brings Lori to her lab at Voodoo Mansion where she introduces Lori to her boyfriend/science experiment, Horatio, who has been lying sedated under the customized coffin-nosed hood of the Cord. Lori discovers that Voodoo Mansion isn't quite in the real world and discovers Sir Andrew now alive, hale and hearty. And if that wasn't enough, a mysterious Dark Lady appears and her only goal is to terrorize Lori in this surreal landscape...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-19 07:03:41. [CVDB144362]
